article: rahul gandhi , scion of india 's famed nehru-gandhi dynasty , won an ecstatic reception monday as he plunged into campaigning for next month 's polls in the constituency that elected his slain father , former prime minister rajiv gandhi .
abstract: gandhi 's son showered with rose petals on indian campaign swing
